name: Swerve City
description:
Are you fast enough?

Swerve City puts you in the driver seat of this white knuckle ride. Dodge traffic and collect coins as your ever faster supercar speeds endlessly through the city.

- See how long you can survive

- Collect coins to unlock 10 new Supercars

- Compete globally for the highest score

Enjoy endless arcade action with this fast paced and addicting driving game.
